troubleshooting.title: System will not turn on
troubleshooting.shortdesc: Everything looks right, but the system still does not start.

condition.title: Condition
condition.p: The system is plugged in, the power switch is on, but the system will not start.

cause.title: Cause
cause.p: The problem is usually due to the power not being supplied to the system through the electrical outlet. Often, a circuit breaker has been tripped so that no power is available at the outlet.

stepsection.note: If you do not know how to reset circuit breakers, do not attempt to fix this problem. Find someone qualified to perform the task.

step.cmd: Turn the system power switch in OFF.
Turn the system power switch to ON.
